title: FS:  T3 McIntyre and T3 Mullin no-ad

posts.post_title: FS:  T3 McIntyre and T3 Mullin no-ad
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joann
For sale two T3's. 

Mullin is in decent shape with creases/dents and has the tougher no-ad back.  Back is clean with essentially same creases as front.  SGC would probably give it a 20 and PSA might sneak it into a 2.  $175.

McIntyre is banged up on the borders, but the image is still fairly sharp.  Back is similar to front with same creases and pinholes.  $105.

Back scans available on request.  For some reason the back scans are larger files than the front scans (?) and too large to post here.

Both prices are shipped.   Email jmkline@juno.com.  Priority to emails over posts.  A committment to purchase gets the card over requests for info, scans, etc.

Thanks.  

Joann
